name: TouristNews
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Listen to daily updates from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
